programme.title: Being Human

programme.desc: Another werewolf befriends George and begins to take him under his wing.

programme.title: Bloody Bites
programme.sub-title: Blood, Sweat and Blood; Fck'n Nuts

programme.title: Spine Chillers
programme.desc: Tarot card reader, Fleur, encounters Nick, who stumbles into Fleur's booth to have his cards read; the Death card comes up and Nick is rather freaked out; he returns home to find his future crumbling before his eyes.

programme.title: Spine Chillers
programme.desc: Hackett has not had a good night's sleep for months, thanks to a recurring dream in which he has to drive 250 miles from London to Bradford to deliver a briefcase; the nightly torment is leaving him exhausted and it is wrecking his life.

programme.title: Itsy Bitsy
programme.desc: An ancient mysterious relic unleashes a giant prehistoric spider that terrorizes a single mother and her two children in their new house.

programme.title: Hell Night
programme.desc: Fraternity and sorority pledges ignore rumors and spend the night in a mansion haunted by victims of a family massacre.

programme.title: Inseminoid
programme.desc: A space-team member (Judy Geeson) goes berserk after being impregnated by something on another planet.

programme.title: Cube
programme.desc: Some strangers wake in a mysterious room inscribed with an unfamiliar code. Looking for ways to escape, they discover the room is riddled with lethal traps, and as fear and distrust swirl around them, the group must work together to survive.

programme.title: Titan Find
programme.desc: An alien-thing stalks corporate rivals from U.S. and German spaceships on one of Saturn's moons.

programme.title: Humanoids From the Deep
programme.desc: A fisherman (Doug McClure) and a scientist (Ann Turkel) fight back when mossy sea monsters assault women.
